DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will examine whether 2-cycles of DFP chemotherapy before definitive concurrent chemoradiation therapy (CCRT) can improve progression-free survival in locally advanced (Stage III & IVM0) hypopharyngeal and base of tongue carcinoma compared to definitive CCRT alone.
DOC.brief_title: Neoadjuvant Chemotherapy for Locally Advanced Squamous Cell Cancer of the Head and Neck (SCCHN)
DOC.criteria: Histologically/cytologically proven stage III/IVM0 hypopharyngeal or base of tongue cancer One or more evaluable or measurable lesion No prior chemotherapy, radiation, or surgery ECOG 02 Distant metastasis Other malignancy
